meanings.definition: A type of bird known for its distinctive call and behavior of feigning injury to distract predators from its nest.
meanings.sent1: The killdeers chirped loudly to warn others of danger.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of killdeers near the lake.
meanings.sent3: The killdeers pretended to have a broken wing to trick the fox.
meanings.sent4: The killdeers' act of playing injured is like a clever magic trick.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the killdeers' protective behavior was truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'killdeer', referring to more than one of these birds.
meanings.sent1: Many killdeers were flying gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The field was filled with the beauty of the killdeers.
meanings.sent3: Seeing a flock of killdeers always brings a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: The killdeers in the meadow resembled a moving painting.
meanings.sent5: The killdeers' presence added a touch of nature's charm to the landscape.
